description: Try our easy to follow Baked Pork Chops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork chop,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Apple,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Baked Pork Chops Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Royal Gala apple, thinly sliced on the round

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 250Â°C. Drizzle base of roasting pan with half the oil. Add onion, cut-side down. Roast for 5 minutes.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a frying pan over high heat. Cook pork for 8 minutes, turning over halfway, or until golden. Add pork, apple and rosemary to roasting pan with onion. Roast for a further 5-8 minutes or until pork is cooked through and apple is golden. Serve with Sticky apple sauce (see recipe).
